text.div:
Metadata
Title ANC.DT.35 Family planning counselling
Version 0.3.0
Identifier ANC.DT.35
Use Context Workflow Task = Counselling, in-facility management & treatment
Jurisdiction Global (Whole world)
Steward (Publisher) World Health Organization (WHO)
Description

General counselling to be provided/reviewed at every contact
Type ECA Rule
PlanDefinition Action
Title ANC.DT.35 Family planning counselling
Trigger Type Named Event
Trigger Name ANC.B10. Counselling, in-facility management & treatment
PlanDefinition Sub-Action (Parent Action Title: ANC.DT.35 Family planning counselling)
Id 1
Title Conduct counselling on postpartum family planning
Description Conduct COUNSELLING ON postpartum family planning
Human-interpretable Description Possible methods include: Levonorgestrel IUD, copper IUD, implants, LAM, oral contraceptive pills, sterilization, tubal ligation Note: LAM is an effective method for breastfeeding women who are amenorrhoeic and their infant < 6 months of age; Breastfeeding women < 6 weeks postpartum are generally advised not to use injectables and should not use combined hormonal contraceptive (CHC); Breastfeeding women ≥ 6 weeks can use injectables without restriction; Breastfeeding women ≥ 6 weeks to < 6 months postpartum (primarily breastfeeding) generally should not use CHCs unless other more appropriate methods are not available or acceptable (16).
Condition Kind: Applicability
Logic Definition: Should Conduct COUNSELLING ON postpartum family planning
PlanDefinition Logic
Primary Library ANC.DT.35 Family planning counselling
Logic Definition
